title:
Is there a law to register a vehicle within thirty days of moving to NC?

It would seem that employers would encourage employees to register vehicles and to become legal residents of NC in a timely manner.  Unfortunately for our community, this law & this source of revenue are not being enforced. Who enforces this and what can be done to encourage registration of vehicles when folks move to our community?
